title: 183 Eating Raw and Living Your Passion with Fully Raw Kristina
description:
"Everything we put into our body, we have an emotional attachment to it." - Kristina Carrillo-Bucaram
If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, video and more at lewishowes.com/183.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
